Verses: 1 yesu Kiristhuvin Oozhiyakkaaranum, Apposthalanaagumpadi Azhaikkappattavanum, Dhevanudaiya Suviseshaththirkaagap Piriththedukkappattavanumaagiya Pavul,
2 romaaburiyilulla Dhevappiriyarum Parisuththavaangalaagumpadi Azhaikkappattavargalumaagiya Anaivarukkum Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu;
3 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.

4 yesukiristhuvaikkuriththuth Dhevan Thammudaiya Theerkkadharisigal Moolamaaip Parisuththa Vedhaagamangalil Munne Thammudaiya Suviseshaththaip Patri Vaakkuththaththampanninapadi Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvaanavar,

5 maamsaththinpadi Thaaveedhin Sandhadhiyil Pirandhavarum, Parisuththamulla Aaviyinpadi Dhevanudaiya Sudhanendru Mariththorilirundhu Uyirththezhundhadhinaale Balamaai Roobikkappatta Dhevakumaaranumaayirukkiraar.
6 avar Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum, Avargalukkul Yesukiristhuvinaal Azhaikkappattavargalaagiya Ungalaiyum,
7 thamadhu Naamaththinimiththam Visuvaasaththukkuk Keezhppadiyappannumporuttu, Engalukkuk Kirubaiyaiyum Apposthala Oozhiyaththaiyum Arulichseydhirukkiraar.
8 ungal Visuvaasam Ulagamengum Pirasiththamaagirapadiyinaale, Mudhalaavadhu Naan Ungalellaarukkaagavum Yesu Kiristhu Moolamaai En Dhevanai Sthoththirikkiren.

9 naan Jebampannumpodhellaam Idaividaamal Ungalai Ninaiththuk Kondirukkiradhaikkuriththuth Thamadhu Kumaaranudaiya Suviseshaththinaale En Aaviyodu Naan Sevikkira Dhevan Enakkuch Saatchiyaayirukkiraar.
10 neengal Sthirappaduvadharkaaga Aavikkuriya Sila Varangalai Ungalukkuk Kodukkumpadikkum,
11 ungalilum Ennilumulla Visuvaasaththinaal Ungalodekooda Naanum Aarudhaladaiyumpadikkum, Ungalaik Kaana Vaanjaiyaayirukkirapadiyinaale,
12 evvidhaththilaavadhu Naan Ungalidaththil Varugiradharkuth Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinaale Enakku Nalla Pirayaanam Seekkiraththil Kidaikkavendumendru Vendikkollugiren.

13 sagodharare, Purajaadhigalaana Matravargalukkulle Naan Balanai Adaindhadhu Pola Ungalukkullum Sila Balanai Adaiyumpadikku, Ungalidaththil Varap Palamurai Yosanaiyaayirundhen, Aayinum Idhuvaraikkum Enakkuth Thadaiyundaayitru Endru Neengal Ariyaadhirukka Enakku Manadhillai.
14 girekkarukkum, Matra Anniyargalukkum, Gnaanigalukkum, Moodarukkum Naan Kadanaaliyaayirukkiren.
15 aagaiyaal Romaapuriyilirukkira Ungalukkum Ennaal Iyandramattum Suviseshaththaip Pirasangikka Virumbugiren.
16 kiristhuvin Suviseshaththaik Kuriththu Naan Vetkappaden; Munbu Yoodharilum Pinbu Girekkarilum Visuvaasikkiravanevano Avanukku Ratchippu Undaavadharku Adhu Dhevabelanaayirukkiradhu.
17 visuvaasaththinaale Needhimaan Pizhaippaan Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi Visuvaasaththinaal Undaagum Dhevaneedhi Visuvaasaththirkendru Andha Suviseshaththinaal Velippaduththappadugiradhu.
18 saththiyaththai Aniyaayaththinaale Adakkivaikkira Manusharudaiya Ellaavidha Avabakdhikkum Aniyaayaththukkum Virodhamaai, Dhevakobam Vaanaththilirundhu Velippaduththappattirukkiradhu.
19 dhevanaikkuriththu Ariyappaduvadhu Avargalukkulle Velippaduththappattirukkiradhu; Dhevane Adhai Avargalukku Velippaduththiyirukkiraar.

20 eppadiyendraal, Kaanappadaadhavaigalaagiya Avarudaiya Niththiya Vallamai Dhevaththuvam Enbavaigal, Undaakkappattirukkiravaigalinaale, Ulagamundaanadhumudharkondu, Thelivaaik Kaanappadum; Aadhalaal Avargal Pokkuchsolla Idamillai.

21 avargal Dhevanai Arindhum, Avaraith Dhevanendru Magimaippaduththaamalum, Sthoththiriyaamalumirundhu, Thangal Sindhanaigalinaale Veenaraanaargal, Unarvillaadha Avargaludaiya Irudhayam Iruladaindhadhu.
22 avargal Thangalai Gnaanigalendru Solliyum Payiththiyakkaararaagi,
23 azhivillaadha Dhevanudaiya Magimaiyai Azhivulla Manushargal Paravaigal Mirugangal Oorum Piraanigal Aagiya Ivaigaludaiya Roobangalukku Oppaaga Maatrinaargal.
24 idhinimiththam Avargal Thangal Irudhayaththilulla Ichchaigalinaale Oruvarodoruvar Thangal Sareerangalai Avamaanappaduththaththakkadhaaga, Dhevan Avargalai Asuththaththirku Oppukkoduththaar.
25 dhevanudaiya Saththiyaththai Avargal Poiyaaga Maatri, Sirushtigaraith Thozhudhu Seviyaamal Sirushtiyaith Thozhudhu Seviththaargal, Avare Endrendraikkum Sthoththirikkappattavar. Aamen.
26 idhinimiththam Dhevan Avargalai Izhivaana Ichchairogangalukku Oppukkoduththaar; Andhappadiye Avargaludaiya Pengal Subaava Anupogaththaich Subaavaththukku Virodhamaana Anupogamaaga Maatrinaargal.

27 appadiye Aangalum Pengalaich Subaavappadi Anubaviyaamal, Oruvarmeloruvar Viragathaapaththinaale Pongi, Aanode Aan Avalatchanamaanadhai Nadappiththu Thangal Thappidhaththirkuth Thagudhiyaana Balanaith Thangalukkul Adaindhaargal.
28 dhevanai Ariyum Arivaip Patrikkondirukka Avargalukku Manadhillaadhirundhapadiyaal, Thagaadhavaigalaich Seyyumpadi, Dhevan Avargalaik Kedaana Sindhaikku Oppukkoduththaar.

29 avargal Sagalavidha Aniyaayaththinaalum, Vesiththanaththinaalum, Thurogaththinaalum, Porulaasaiyinaalum, Kurodhaththinaalum Niraiyappattu; Poraamaiyinaalum, Kolaiyinaalum, Vaakkuvaadhaththinaalum, Vanjagaththinaalum, Vanmaththinaalum Niraindhavargalumaai,

30 purankoorugiravargalumaai, Avadhooru Pannugiravargalumaai, Dhevapagaignarumaai, Thuraagirudhampannugiravargalumaai, Agandhaiyullavargalumaai, Veembukkaararumaai, Pollaadhavaigalai Yosiththuppinaikkiravargalumaai Petraarukkuk Keezhppadiyaadhavargalumaai,
31 unarvillaadhavargalumaai, Udanpadikkaigalai Meerugiravargalumaai, Subaava Anbillaadhavargalumaai, Inangaadhavargalumaai, Irakkamillaadhavargalumaai Irukkiraargal.

32 ippadippattavaigalai Seygiravargal Maranaththirkup Paaththiraraayirukkiraargalendru Dhevan Theermaaniththa Needhiyaana Theerppai Avargal Arindhirundhum, Avaigalaith Thaangale Seygiradhumallaamal, Avaigalai Seygira Matravargalidaththil Piriyappadugiravargalumaayirukkiraargal.
